VOSONDash 0.6.3
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

add_centrality_measures()

Add centrality measures to graph as node attributes

applyCategoricalFilters()

Filter out graph nodes not in selected category

applyPruneFilter()

Prune nodes from graph by node id

apply_comp_filter()

Filter out graph nodes not in component size range

apply_feature_filter()

Filter out graph nodes and edges from graph object that are isolates, multi edge or edge loops

dash()

Run the VOSON Dashboard Shiny Application

getNodeCategories()

Get a list of node category attribute names and values

get_graph_centrlzn()

Get graph centralization measures for an igraph object

get_graph_metrics()

Get network metrics from an igraph object

get_rddt_data()

Get reddit thread data

get_rddt_lst_data()

Get reddit thread listings for one or more subreddits

get_rddt_url_id()

Get a reddit thread id from url

get_rddt_url_subrddt()

Get subreddit name from url

get_wordcloud_plot()

Create a wordcloud plot

get_word_freqs()

Create a word frequency dataframe

get_word_freq_chart()

Create a word frequency chart

get_ytbe_video_id()

Get a youtube video id from url

graph_text_as_corpus()

Create a text corpus from graph text attribute data

loadPackageGraph()

Load package included network graph

mixmat()

Create a mixing matrix

VOSONDash-package VOSONDash "_PACKAGE"

Interface for collection and interactive analysis of social networks
